translations.modules.scheduler.interval.label: Calculate Interval
translations.modules.scheduler.interval.description: Calculate interval timing and next occurrences
translations.modules.scheduler.interval.params.start_: Start time in ISO 8601 format (default: now)
translations.modules.scheduler.interval.output.next_r: List of next 5 run times as ISO datetime strings
translations.modules.scheduler.cron_parse.label: Parse Cron Expression
translations.modules.scheduler.cron_parse.description: Parse cron expression and calculate next N run times
translations.modules.scheduler.cron_parse.params.coun: Number of next run times to calculate
translations.modules.scheduler.cron_parse.params.time: Timezone for calculation (UTC offset like "+8" or "-5", default "0" for UTC)
translations.modules.scheduler.cron_parse.output.next: List of next run times as ISO datetime strings
translations.modules.scheduler.delay.label: Delay / Sleep
translations.modules.scheduler.delay.description: Pause execution for a specified duration
translations.modules.scheduler.delay.params.message.d: Optional message to include in the result
